DOC.brief_summary: This study will be a single subject study to evaluate the efficacy of the HER2 kinase inhibitor, neratinib, in a patient with metastatic bladder cancer harboring a HER2-GRB7 gene fusion.
DOC.brief_title: Single Subject Neratinib in Bladder Cancer (NRR)
DOC.criteria: * none * none We have received FDA approval for a single subject Investigational New Drug (IND) Application to treat a specific patient with the HER2 kinase inhibitor neratinib. Therefore there is no inclusion / exclusion criteria.
